Package base

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • base.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessPointNode, StationNode

    public abstract class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the basic functionality of every embedded Wi-Fi module. This model is based upon the functionality provided by the ESP 8266 Wi-Fi from Espressif
    Author:
    ingframin

    • Method Detail

      • dischargeBattery

        public void dischargeBattery​(double charge)
        This method models the energy usage by the node
        Parameters:
        charge - amount of charge lost. It must be positive. If more than 100% the module dies.

      • chargeBattery

        public void chargeBattery​(double charge)
        This method models recharging the battery
        Parameters:
        charge - amount of charge absorbed during the charge operation. It must be positive. Battery charge caps at 100%.
